definition: Eve (in Protestant versions of the Bible) (from Hebrew Ḥawwāh, probably via Cantonese 夏娃 {Haa6waa1})
the Xia or Hsia dynasty c. 2000 BC/Xia of the Sixteen Kingdoms (407-432)/surname Xia

sentences.english: Creative Adam and Eve inspired blanket cover for your bed.
sentences.chinese: 受亞當和夏娃所啓發的創意毛毯牀罩。

sentences.english: Adam and Eve played the first game of hide and seek.
sentences.chinese: 亞當和夏娃是“躲貓貓”遊戲的鼻祖。

sentences.english: Adam named his wife Eve, because she would become the mother of all the living.
sentences.chinese: 亞當給他妻子起名叫夏娃，因爲她是衆生之母。

sentences.english: Eve's rounded bottom takes longer to form than the sharp Adam spike.
sentences.chinese: 夏娃的圓底比齊亞黨的尖底繪花去更長的形成時間。

sentences.english: Eve in Hebrew means: life, life-giving.
sentences.chinese: 夏娃的名字是生命和給予生命的意思。

sentences.english: The Serpent tempted Eve to pick the forbidden fruit.
sentences.chinese: 那條毒蛇誘使夏娃摘取禁果。

sentences.english: Because every one of us inherited Adam and Eve's inclination toward independence from God.
sentences.chinese: 由於我們每個人都繼續了亞當夏娃離棄神的偏向。

sentences.english: Tumnus: But you're saying, you're a daughter of eve?
sentences.chinese: 你是說你是夏娃的女人子？

sentences.english: It reminded me of Adam and Eve.
sentences.chinese: 這使我想起了亞當和夏娃。

sentences.english: This is the knowledge of good and evil of which Adam and Eve partook.
sentences.chinese: 這就是亞當和夏娃瞭解的有關善與惡的知識。

sentences.english: It's the eating of the forbidden fruit by Adam and Eve.
sentences.chinese: 這就是亞當和夏娃偷吃了禁果。

sentences.english: Ever since the days when Adam and Eve sinned, humanity has been away from its home in God.
sentences.chinese: 自從亞當夏娃犯罪的日子，人就已經遠離神的家了。

sentences.english: We can blame the devil for making Adam and Eve sin.
sentences.chinese: 我們可以指責撒旦讓亞當夏娃犯罪。

sentences.english: I'm quite sure Adam F U C Ked Eve in the ass.
sentences.chinese: 我十分肯定亞當巖藻糖克季夏娃的屁股。

sentences.english: Is precisely this light appearance only then causes Eve to believe that is the god wants her to eat.
sentences.chinese: 正是這光的出現才使得夏娃相信那是神要她喫的。

sentences.english: She gave it to me. Eve explains, the serpent tricked me.
sentences.chinese: 夏娃解釋說，是蛇欺騙了她。

definition: variant of 撒旦[Sa1 dan4], Satan or Shaitan
Book of Genesis/First Book of Moses
(third person pronoun for a divine being)
Cain (name)/Cain (biblical character), a figure of Judeo-Christian-Muslim mythology
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
